title: Smart Patient Record System
message: Securely store and access your medical records through MediChain’s blockchain-powered system — ensuring privacy, accuracy, and instant availability across hospitals.

title: AI-Based Health Diagnostics
message: Experience faster and more accurate diagnosis with MediChain’s AI engine that analyzes patient data and lab reports for better treatment decisions.

title: Telemedicine & E-Consultation
message: Book online consultations with certified doctors, share health data securely, and receive digital prescriptions — all powered by MediChain’s decentralized healthcare network.
